content:
Is that possible to collapse sections 4.3 Code Systems and 4.4 Value Sets in TOC? Or even delete long lists of code systems and value sets since they are listed in separate pages anyway:
http://build.fhir.org/terminologies-systems.html
http://build.fhir.org/terminologies-valuesets.html
it might be possible. can you make a task?

it might be possible. can you make a task?

I was not sure where to create a task, so logged in GF [#19248]
